name: Jump Skunk
storyline: To reach the picnic, Jump Skunk must skillfully navigate a path filled with various obstacles, requiring him to run, hop, and glide his way to lunch!
summary: Jump Skunk is an exciting one-minute runner game with new stages available every day! Challenge your friends and compete for the world record as you jump and glide to avoid spikes and reach the picnic. With one-minute stages and instant load times, you always have time for one more try! Download now and experience the thrill of Jump Skunk on your android device.
